Author: wavyslime
Title: [ANN][LPX]LOOPX Coin ICO - NEW ARBITRAGE LENDING PLATFORM beginning 2018![ANN]
Body: Good afternoon team LoopX, I have a few questions I'd like answered if you could please. Thanks in advance.   1. How come the site is only registered for one year? 2. I see on the road map that the project began a few months back but the site was recently created/put up, is there any reason why the website wasn't created a few months back? 3. Do you have a github? If so can you provide link? 5. In terms of marketing the site hasn't gotten any traffic, what is your marketing team working on implementing to make this a popular ICO? 6. Will the ICO run round after round like IDEA and LIBRA coin? 7.  I see the internal exchange is going to launch within a few days after the ICO, is it finished? If so do you have some screen shot of how the internal exchange looks? 8. Your planning to be listed on external exchanges if so which exchanges? Have you contacted them regarding your listing and is there proof if you have? 9. What makes you different from all these other lending platforms coming out? 10. How come the wallets won't be released until May? We would like to have the block explorer released so we can start staking around the time your internal exchange begins? 11. ARE YOU A SCAM?  I know that was a lot of questions but  I would like to have some feedback.  I'm planning to do a video for my subscribers.

Author: LoopX_Support
Title: [ANN][LPX]LOOPX Coin ICO - NEW ARBITRAGE LENDING PLATFORM beginning 2018![ANN]
Body: Hello Wavyslime,  I feel honored that your first ever post on Bitcointalk is for our project.  all your questions are more than legitimate.  We are in a hot phase at the moment of our ICO . We pushed hard to make this Christmas Sale happen. That is why you see flaws on our website and also maybe in some points of the roadmap. I just noted all your concerns and will bring them to the table in the next meeting once the initial phase of the Christmas Sale is over. So if you could give me a few days , I will get back to you with answers to all your questions.  thank you for taking your time and I hope we manage to get a good review from you before the Pre-ICO.  kind regards.  Bradley LoopX Team

Author: LoopX_Support
Title: [ANN][LPX]LOOPX Coin ICO - NEW ARBITRAGE LENDING PLATFORM beginning 2018![ANN]
Body: We are very excited about this day. It is the 20th of December and Christmas is coming early this year. We didn´t know in the beginning if it would be a great idea to really push ourselfes to make this Pre Pre Sale happen, more then 13 days prior to our scheduled Pre-ICO. But our amazing marketing and programing team succeeded and we are proud that today is the day and our first phase of sale will go live.  The overwhelming response we got the last 2 days gave us the confirmation we did the right thing.  WARNING: To make sure everybody will be content with the sale today, we have to give you one last warning regarding the recent events the last 24h.  If you didn´t notice, Coinbase just announced and also listed Bitcoin Cash as their fourth currency on their exchange. This is major news. Combined with the Future Market which just opened the price of BTC can fluctuate tremendously the upcoming days. Because of this events and the enormous transaction costs for BTC, we urge everybody to make the payments on our site with ETH.  Thats only a recomendation and everybody is free to decide which currency he or she will use.    If you have any additional questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.  We are proud to be partners with you in this endeavor. And we hope that this experience will be fulfilling for you!  Best regards,  LoopX Team Join the Cryptolution

Title: [ANN][LPX]LOOPX Coin ICO - NEW ARBITRAGE LENDING PLATFORM beginning 2018![ANN]

The question is how will you pay out the tokens if someone wants to convert the lending interest from dollars to LPX if there is not surplus set of surplus with you? You have a 10m supply out of which the promoters will hold 1.8m LPX and the rest (8.2m) sold. Now if I want to rent my coins, how will I convert my USD intrest to LPX if there are no additional LPX available?  Rgards Anurag

Author: LoopX_Support
Title: [ANN][LPX]LOOPX Coin ICO - NEW ARBITRAGE LENDING PLATFORM beginning 2018![ANN]
Body: What Is LoopX? After developing over months and testing successfully with great profits, we can release now with great confidence the LoopX Trading Algorithm. This Software will give us all the opportunity to make more money online then we could ever do in real life. Our software handles over 10.000 trades per second and calculates over 100 currencies at a time. Always looking for those opportunities to make profits bigger then 10%, which will payed out to our members on a weekly basis.This was not thinkable in the normal financal sector, but has become reality in the cryptoworld. To let you invest with ease in our company we will build a Peer-to-Peer Lending platform where you can see your investments grow in real time.   VISION LoopX will publish a revolutionized Peer-to-Peer trading platform where users as easy as a mouseclick can give us the opportunity to put their money to work. We programmed the most advanced Trading-Algorithm in the cryptocurrency market to date and will continue to make it better every day. Cause the market never stops and so won´t we. We believe the crypto community should act and work as a big family to help each other benefit from this incredible possibilities out there at this very moment. We want to create a community and are here to support it and let it grow in the upcoming years. The time to act is now. We did it and so should you.  LPX SPECIFICATION: Coin Name: LoopX-Coin Abbreviation: LPX Website: https://www.loopx.io Available Coins Supply: 10,000,000 LPX Available Coins for ICO: 8,200,000 LPX (82% of Total Supply) Coin type: Proof of Stake  Whitepaper: https://www.loopx.io/media/loopx_whitepaper.pdf  ICO: PRE-ICO START DATE 03rd January 2018, 4pm GMT ICO START DATE 10th January 2018 4pm GMT ROUNDS Pre-Sale + 5 Single Rounds ACCEPTED CONTRIBUTIONS BTC & ETH   Pre-Sale:  1,200,000 LPX (0.70$) ICO Round 1:  1,000,000 LPX (0.80$) ICO Round 2:  1,200,000 LPX (0.90$) ICO Round 3:  1,400,000 LPX (1.00$) ICO Round 4:  1,600,000 LPX (1.10$) ICO Round 5:  1,800,000 LPX (1.20$)  Lending: Lending is to invest your own LoopX-Coins at our online platform to get a weekly return from our management of the LoopX-Coins. It is an impressive and already proofen concept for passive investors and for those who want to enjoy a weekly passive income. No fixed weekly interest rate can be guaranteed. The maximum interest rate is 48% per month on your investment. When the contract expires then the investment fund will be returned in accordance with terms & conditions. You can invest Loopx-Coins in our lending platform from your dashboard. This investment option allows you to profit from the LoopX trading bot and the volatility software. This bot buys and sells cryptocurrencies automatically. You can take out your capital from LoopX-Coin lending platform or reinvest at any time. LINKS:  1. Please read details of LPX Coin distribution on https://www.loopx.io/  2. Invite your friends to join our Telegram Announcement channel here: https://t.me/loopx_news  3. Watch and share our video on youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5HIvBftDwDyQdvRoSWQarQ  4. Like us on Facebook at: https://www.facebook.com/LoopX-2021730828111348/  5. and follow us on Twitter at: https://twitter.com/LoopxCoin
